message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to us, I propose a price of $120 for it. I understand its worth to you might be around $80, but I hope this offer is within your consideration. Looking forward to your response.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $80 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I've decided to adjust my offer. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product. This is higher than my initial offer but still below what I consider the product's true value. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am unable to meet at $95. I would like to make a counteroffer of $80 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
